t: Homer Laughlin China – Premium Dinnerware Website
s: Founded in 1871 by brothers Homer and Shakespeare Laughlin in East Liverpool, Ohio, the company began as Ohio Valley Pottery, producing quality pottery ware. In 1877, Shakespeare sold his share to Homer, leading to the establishment of The Homer Laughlin China Works.

Homer Laughlin - Wikipedia
s: March 30, 2025 - Laughlin Pottery then became the Homer Laughlin China Company. In 1889, William Edwin Wells joined Homer Laughlin, and seven years later the two incorporated the company. Laughlin sold his interest to Wells shortly thereafter. The company moved operations across the Ohio River to West Virginia ...
